text: The Order of Carol I () is one of the three (current) dynastic orders of knighthood of the Romanian Royal Family. It is the highest ranking and was the highest ranking of orders of the Kingdom of Romania. It is named in honour of the first King of Romania, Carol I, established on his 40th Jubilee. As of 2017, there are only three Recipients, Margareta, Custodian of the Crown of Romania (Sovereign of the Order), her husband Prince Radu and her younger sister and heir, Princess Elena of Romania. Carol I
title: Order of Carol I
